field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓exists(select 1 from #unit b where @@table.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and @@table.so_ct = b.so_ct having count(b.ma_dvcs) > 1)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: tk_no
field.check: tk_no not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_nt
field.check: ma_nt not in (select ma_nt from dmnt)

field.name: ma_thue
field.check: ma_thue <> '' and ma_thue not in (select ma_thue from dmthue)

field.name: tk_thue
field.check: ma_thue <> '' and tk_thue not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_kh2
field.check: ma_thue <> '' and ma_kh2 = '' and exists(select 1 from dmtk b where @@table.tk_thue = b.tk and b.tk_cn = 1)⩓ma_thue <> '' and ma_kh2 <> '' and ma_kh2 not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv <> '' and ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and so_lsx not in (select so_lsx from phlsx)

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_hd
field.check: ma_hd <> '' and ma_hd not in (select ma_hd from dmhd)

field.name: ma_phi
field.check: ma_phi <> '' and ma_phi not in (select ma_phi from dmphi)

field.name: ma_ku
field.check: ma_ku <> '' and ma_ku not in (select ma_ku from dmku)

processing.text: &CheckVoucherRightBeforeProcess; declare @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(512), @locked nvarchar(512), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(8), @voucherID varchar(8) declare @master varchar(16), @detail varchar(16), @inquiry varchar(16), @general varchar(16), @baseCurrency varchar(8), @baseExchangeRate numeric(24, 12), @taxProperty varchar(3), @voucherTemplate varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @m int, @y int, @max1 int, @max2 int, @count int, @roundAmount int, @checkInputVAT bit, @datetime0 char(21), @d0 datetime select @d0 = getdate(), @datetime0 = convert(char(8), @d0, 112) + ' ' + convert(char(12), @d0, 114), @status = left(replace(@status, '''', ''), 1) select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @master = 'm&Detail;$', @detail = 'd&Detail;$', @inquiry = 'i&Detail;$', @general = 'c&Detail;$000000', @voucherID = '&Code;' select @duplicate = case when @@language = 'v' then N'&s1; đã tồn tại.' else '&s2; already exists.' end select @locked = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Đã khóa số liệu, kiểm tra lại ngày chứng từ tại dòng %s.' else N'Data is locked, please check the date of voucher at row %s.' end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ws_id' select @taxProperty = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_tc_thue' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv' if not exists(select 1 from dmmauct where ma_mau_ct = @voucherTemplate) select @voucherTemplate = '' select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @roundAmount = cast(rtrim(val) as int) from options where name = 'm_round_tien' select @baseExchangeRate = ty_gia from (select top 1 ty_gia from dmtgnt where ma_nt = @baseCurrency and ngay_ct <= getdate() order by ngay_ct desc) a if exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kthd_tdv' and val = '1') select @checkInputVAT = 1 else select @checkInputVAT = 0 select @max1 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @master + '000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @max2 = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = @detail + '000000' and column_name = 'so_lsx' -- Checking update @@table set so_ct = space(@max1 - len(rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)))) + rtrim(ltrim(so_ct)) &ImportOverwriteData; if @check$Unit <> '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C001' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end else begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'so_ct', stt, 'C002' from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @r = min(stt) from @@table a join c&Detail;$000000 b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs&ImportSqlWhere;&VoucherLogImportExtendKey;&ImportOverwriteCheckKey; end end if @r is not null and @$mode <> 1 begin if @check$Unit <> '1' select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r else select replace(replace(replace(replace(@duplicate$Unit, '%s1', so_ct), '%s2', convert(varchar(12), cast(ngay_ct as smalldatetime), 103)), '%s3', rtrim(ma_dvcs)), '%s4', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end -- Update update @@table set so_lsx = space(@max2 - len(ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)))) + ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)), ma_nt = case when ma_nt <> '' then ma_nt else @baseCurrency end select top 0 ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct into #unit from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #unit select ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct from @@table group by ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct -- Locked Date &ImportLockedDateCheck; @@checking(1); update @@table set tk_thue = case when a.tk_thue <> '' then a.tk_thue else b.tk_thue_no3 end from @@table a left join dmthue b on a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue where a.ma_thue <> '' @@checking(2); @@checking(3); &ConfigDynamicImportChecking; &ImportOverwriteChecking;&EndErrorMode; -- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #id(stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, stt) select '', a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, min(a.stt) from @@table a&ImportOverwriteIdentiyDataCondition; group by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, convert(varchar(8), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ngay_ct, so_ct, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) select @count = count(*) from #id exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @count, @@userID &ImportOverwriteProcess; select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ngay_ct, so_ct, dien_giai, tk_no, tien_nt, tien, thue_nt, thue, ma_vv, ma_bp, so_lsx, ma_sp, ma_hd, ma_phi, ma_ku, loai_hd, ma_thue, tk_thue, thue_suat, ma_kh2 into #d&Detail; from d&Detail;$000000 insert into #d&Detail; select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.dien_giai_i, a.tk_no, a.tien_nt, round(a.tien_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.thue_nt, round(a.thue_nt * a.ty_gia, @roundAmount), a.ma_vv, a.ma_bp, a.so_lsx, a.ma_sp, a.ma_hd, a.ma_phi, a.ma_ku, 0, a.ma_thue, a.tk_thue, d.thue_suat, a.ma_kh2 from @@table a join #id b on a.ngay_ct = b.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = b.so_ct left join dmthue d on a.ma_thue = d.ma_thue join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt order by a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.stt select top 0 stt_rec, status, ma_dvcs, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_kh, dia_chi, dien_giai, loai_tt, loai_ct, tk, t_tien_nt, t_tien, t_tt_nt, t_tt, t_thue_nt, t_thue, ma_nt, ty_gia, dong_tien_yn into #m&Detail; from m&Detail;$000000 insert into #m&Detail; select b.stt_rec, @status, c.ma_dvcs, a.ngay_ct, a.so_ct, a.ma_kh, isnull(e.dia_chi, ''), a.dien_giai, a.loai_tt, a.loai_ct, a.tk, d.t_tien_nt, d.t_tien, d.t_tt_nt, d.t_tt, d.t_thue_nt, d.t_thue, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.dong_tien_yn from @@table a join #id b on a.stt = b.stt join #unit c on a.ngay_ct = c.ngay_ct and a.so_ct = c.so_ct join (select stt_rec, sum(tien_nt) as t_tien_nt, sum(tien) as t_tien, sum(tien_nt + thue_nt) as t_tt_nt, sum(tien + thue) as t_tt, sum(thue_nt) as t_thue_nt, sum(thue) as t_thue from #d&Detail; group by stt_rec) d on b.stt_rec = d.stt_rec left join dmkh e on a.ma_kh = e.ma_kh select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, status, user_id0, c$, m$, d$, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i&Detail; from i&Detail;$000000 insert into #i&Detail; select stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_dvcs, @status, @user, convert(varchar(12), ngay_ct, 112) + so_ct + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_kh) + '#20$' + rtrim(tk) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_nt), '' from #m&Detail; select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i&Detail;', '#d&Detail;', 'd$', 'tk_no', '#10$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert declare @p varchar(32), @insertKey varchar(128), @masterTable varchar(32), @detailTable varchar(32), @inquiryTable varchar(32), @taxTable varchar(32) select distinct month(ngay_ct) as m, year(ngay_ct) as y into #k from #id select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k while @r is not null begin select @m = m, @y = y from #k where y * 12 + m = @r select @p = rtrim(@y) + replace(str(@m, 2), ' ', '0'), @insertKey = 'month(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@m) + ' and year(ngay_ct) = ' + rtrim(@y) select @masterTable = @master + @p, @detailTable = @detail + @p, @inquiryTable = @inquiry + @p select @q = @@inserting(master, @masterTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(detail, @detailTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q select @q = @@inserting(inquiry, @inquiryTable, @insertKey); exec sp_executesql @q &ImportOverwriteInsertingByPart; select @r = min(y * 12 + m) from #k where y * 12 + m > @r end @@inserting(general); &ImportOverwriteInserting;
